content:
Certainly! Here are a few popular FPS games that have similar ranking systems to Overwatch:

1) Rainbow Six Siege - the game features a skill rating system that ranges from Copper to Champion, with players competing in 5v5 matches to increase their rating. Similar to Overwatch, Rainbow Six Siege also features seasonal competition where players can earn rewards such as weapon skins, unique uniforms, and operator headgears.

2) Counter-Strike: Global Offensive (CS:GO) - In CS:GO, players compete in teams of 5 to take down their opponents while earning ranking points. The game features a tiered ranking system that ranges from Silver to Global Elite, with players receiving unique medals and coins when they reach certain ranks. CS:GO also offers seasonal competition with rewards for top rankers.

3) Apex Legends - the game features a tiered ranking system that ranges from Bronze to Apex Predator. Players are matched with similar skill level opponents as they compete in 3v3 matches. Apex Legends offers unique badges and gun charms as rewards for players that reach certain ranks.

4) Call of Duty: Modern Warfare (and Warzone) - both games feature a tiered ranking system that ranges from Rookie to Master, with players earning points by completing objectives and winning matches. The games also offer seasonal competition with cosmetic items such as weapon skins and emblems as rewards for top rankers.

All of these games feature fun, engaging ranking systems that can provide hours of enjoyable gameplay.
